description:
If you are looking for a proper tool to work with data and SQL queries with an ad-hoc visual query builder, you've got to a look at FlySpeed SQL Query. This Windows app connects to all modern database servers and works with all popular desktop databases and office file formats (CSV, Excel).

With FlySpeed SQL Query you can browse and edit data in grid form or via the customizable form view, quickly find and filter data, and set up master-detail views, so dealing with data will be a pleasure.
summary: Free SQL Query Tool for any database
author: Active Database Software
